item.title: Install Ubuntu 21.04 with btrfs + snapper + grub-btrfs
item.description: Table of Contents Video Greetings Links Steps 1. Install Ubuntu Start the Ubiquitu Install Partitioning 2. Update and Upgrade 3. Install grub-btrfs 4. Snapper 5. Subvolume for Snapshots 6. Start the Services 7. Create your First Snapshot Finish Video Greetings Hi all, in this video i will show how to Install Ubuntu 21.04 with btrfs filesystem, snapper and grub-btrfs. You need have ssd, if you use mechanical hdd, please install ext4.
